pr_title: timetracking: add compost bin time trackers

timeline.message: timetracking: add compost bin time trackers
timetracking: add compost bin time trackers

timeline.author: abextm
abextm

replies.bodyText: I didn't observe those enum values. Is there something indicating those varbits should be mapped? I was playing around with the setvarb command earlier and there were other varbits that seemed to map to similar states but again, they were never observed in my testing over a week of making compost.
replies.author: SirGirion

replies.bodyText: They have what looks like valid states in the object config so they should be mapped. Just take a guess, if its actually used and wrong we can fix it later.
replies.author: abextm

replies.bodyText: Yes you were right they correspond to rotten tomatoes.
replies.author: SirGirion

timeline.bodyText: this should be split into a separate section
timeline.author: abextm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -131,7 +131,15 @@
 	CELASTRUS("Celastrus", "Celastrus tree", PatchImplementation.CELASTRUS, ItemID.BATTLESTAFF, 160, 6, 0, 4),
 	REDWOOD("Redwood", "Redwood tree", PatchImplementation.REDWOOD, ItemID.REDWOOD_LOGS, 640, 11),
 	HESPORI("Hespori", NullItemID.NULL_23044, 640, 4, 0, 2),
-	CRYSTAL_TREE("Crystal tree", ItemID.CRYSTAL_SHARDS, 80, 7);
+	CRYSTAL_TREE("Crystal tree", ItemID.CRYSTAL_SHARDS, 80, 7),

replies.bodyText: Like another top level tab icon? I didn't want to add another one because then there'd be 3 rows.
replies.author: SirGirion

replies.bodyText: no just a  // Compost like everything else has
replies.author: abextm

timeline.bodyText: you don't need variants for giant compost, they can use the same as normal since they are not farming contracts
timeline.author: abextm

replies.bodyText: Could you clarify if you mean the different produce or the bins themselves? I do need different produce enums since the giant bins have more harvest stages.
replies.author: SirGirion

timeline.bodyText: fwiw Examine isn't a real menu op and shouldn't be here, but this is just debug from the code generator script so you don't need it anyway
timeline.author: abextm

replies.bodyText: I made these not realizing the stuff was code gen'd so I tried to copy the style of the existing code
